text:
📢 PSA: 
Between 24 hours and 1 hour before departure, you must fill out the ‘Check-Mig’ form, available on the Migración Colombia website. You will receive a confirmation email that you will need to present upon arrival in Colombia.

https://t.co/Mbf4TrY8a2 https://t.co/Kyx6wwqwFq

Bogota is famous for its graffiti, and Street Art is a Public Good

How about a cool collab? 👀🤝

Don't miss out on the cool graffiti tours happening each evening during Devcon — powered by @cryptomurals 

https://t.co/OXLCjQlFki

Three HUGE releases tonight! 🧵
- The Devcon Manual! 📕
- Devcon Passport PWA 🛂
- The Devcon Schedule 🗓

1/ First up, the Devcon Manual: Inside, find everything that you might need as you travel to Bogota, prepare for Devcon, and to have a great time.

https://t.co/RFIsugOgAY

We are working on launching a “Devcon Manual” soon™️ that will serve as a master doc for all things Devcon in Bogotá!

Fasten your seat belts — gonna be a wild week! https://t.co/JDSauSOnYe

During registration (and pre-registration), we will be giving out SIM cards to attendees on a first come first serve basis.

Valid for 15 days. 20GB of data.

1⃣ week to DEVCON WEEK!🎉

BD.

Good time to have another look at our google maps link with all relevant locations!

#DevconVI https://t.co/MYjRC5xeCC

Temperature hovering between 9-18 degrees C (or 48-65 F) with not too much wind!

So don't forget your jackets!
 
Disclaimer: As always this is not packing advice and we have no fiduciary duty towards how to pack 
😉 https://t.co/Lb8r5HkNBo

Don't forget to look over our city guide which is our recommended guide to all things Bogotá!

https://t.co/6SFMGvTMfk
Another great event happening during Devcon Week! https://t.co/8jdhNoVNwi

A Devcon focussed event Dashboard anyone 👀👀

https://t.co/xcx773x4nX

‼️A call to hacker houses and other shared accommodation spaces:

Post your hacker house details here so others can see them!

PS: @windingtree will be a thing for Devcon! Do check it out

🤔Not making it to Bogotá and having FOMO?
📢Host a Devcon Satellite event!

We know that not everyone can make it to Bogotá. So we are supporting 10 meetups across the world for communities to watch the Devcon live stream together.

📅 Deadline: 7th Oct.

https://t.co/6r85CxTLk9
